item.description: The Historic Wayside Inn is a very cool place to hang out. They just started serving breakfast so, this will be my first time. They are well known for great food and they have a bakery! I have a coupon for the bakery too. Get yourselves out on a Sunday morning and come on over to The Wayside Inn and sit and hang out with us for breakfast. See you there. This meet-up is booked on 3 sites. For those of you who are on all 3 sites please book on all of them or else......thanks!
item.how_to_find_us: Meet outside if weather permitting. Try to be on time.

group.name: WEST OF BOSTON OVER 40 GAY WOMENS MEET-UP

item.name: Wayside Inn Breakfast
